tag_professor: EXTRA CREDIT (4)  Inspirational (3)  Respected (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Gives good feedback (1)  Caring (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)
comments: Kathleen is so amazing! I learned a lot about dance and she made me fall in love with it even more. I would take again 100% if you want A you have to do all the work and take advantage of the extra credit!!! don\'t slack off! overall you should take her if you love dance!

tag_professor: EXTRA CREDIT (4)  Inspirational (3)  Respected (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Gives good feedback (1)  Caring (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)
comments: I took her for beginning ballet and she\'s quite lovely. She\'s caring and tries to make you feel confident. It IS a workout though. Don\'t come thinking it\'s an easy A. You gotta show up and actually participate. There\'s a former professional dancer in my class she works up a sweat and you will too. That said, it\'s SO much fun! I highly recommend it.

tag_professor: EXTRA CREDIT (4)  Inspirational (3)  Respected (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Gives good feedback (1)  Caring (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)
comments: Mrs. Burnett is a caring teacher, full of energy and freindly. She gives you a lot of extra credit opportunities and is very passionate about dance. She is one of the best teachers ive had this semester. Honestly if you show up to class pay attention to the notes then passing this class wont be a problem, an easy A hands down.

tag_professor: EXTRA CREDIT (4)  Inspirational (3)  Respected (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Gives good feedback (1)  Caring (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)
comments: I loved taking her DA 101 class, it was an easy and fun class to take, I don\'t understand how people didn\'t get an A in her class.

tag_professor: EXTRA CREDIT (4)  Inspirational (3)  Respected (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Gives good feedback (1)  Caring (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)
comments: Fellow AVC Students, I recommend you DO NOT take this instructor. She is unorganized, scattered in thoughts and choosy. Although the class was easy and she was nice, it\'s easy for you to do wrong on an assignment and earn less points. This is only because she Doesn\'t explain assignments thoroughly. I chose to drop the course for these reasons.

comments: i thought that the whole point in having a teacher is to "teach" you....I guess not.I knew that I wasn\'t doing some things right and she didnt even come by to correct me.If you want to take a french class this might be a good class for you because all she does is tell you what to do without even showing you at least once.

tag_professor: EXTRA CREDIT (4)  Inspirational (3)  Respected (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Gives good feedback (1)  Caring (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)
comments: This professor is horrible.All she did was tell us what to do without demostrating anything.On top of that the class was mixed with beginning,intermediate,and adavanced students which made it impossible to keep up with those who were more advanced.She also favors her students that have been with her awhile too.I dont recommend this professor at all
